comments.body: I find the naming of `OpenBlocks` and `OpenShuffleBlocks` a little awkward. Not a huge deal, but have you considered something like `FetchBlocks` or `ReadBlocks`?
comments.diffHunk:

comments.body: The distinction here is that this RPC isn't really used to fetch or read, just to setup the stream for a subsequent bunch of fetchin'. In this way, it acts analogously to opening a stream, at least more so than reading from a file.
